short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Improved Homepage for Fast Access to Your Favorite Websites!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Default New Tab with Added Functionality! This extension revitalizes your new tab experience with innovative features:

★ Customize your new tab page with two types of shortcuts to your preferred websites, added manually. Gain complete control over your shortcuts, independent of your browsing history.

★ Effortlessly remove shortcuts at your convenience.

★ Enjoy automatic page screenshots for your shortcuts, providing a visual and intuitive browsing experience.
